title: Kon'ya Sachou Meirei de Netoraremasu
description: Sakurako, being the only daughter of a small company president, is able to work but isn't able to tie any marriage proposals due to her plain character. Then, from the rumored young president of an IT company came a marriage proposal!! Without wasting any time, Sakurako went to check out the said proposal and the president gave out the request, 'I want to see my woman being taken away by another guy'!? The SP (security police) of the president starts gradually encroaching away at the surprised Sakurako with his lips - -!?
